name: Przedsiębiorczość dla Ekologii
goal:
Statutory objectives of the Association shall include:
1. protection and preservation of the environment, in particular areas in the province of Wielkopolska, including protection of agricultural lands against their conversion to other uses,
2. environmental education,
3. conservation of areas in the province of Wielkopolska against their excessive industrialisation in order to preserve areas used for agriculture, promotion of areas in the province of Wielkopolska as places of rest,
4. promoting and shaping pro-environmental attitudes.
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Climate Action, Environment
euInitiatives:
- Water Framework Directive
- Natura 2000/ biodiversity
- EU environmental law in general
- EU energy law in general
